Question.Subject: Boy trouble?????????????????????????????????????????????????????????
Question.Content: ok well i have a crush on 2 guys but unforchunitly it is almost valentines day afnd i just broke up with my and i have dated one of theguys i like and one guy lives in my naborhood guy i need your help i am a girl but i need a guys help what shoul i do? amd i like 2 guys

ChosenAnswer: well id just come straight out and tell them how you feel it may sound like a bad idea but in the end they might feel the same
